koohiiStory1: The owl was asked to raise his hand if he needed anything, but he had a wing, not a hand! So he made a tool that looked like a hand which he used when he needed to raise his hand. For raiseing, owl has a tool hand.
koohiiStory2: What raises mankind above others is the wisdom of an owl, the use of tools, and his hand with an opposable thumb. (compare with reputation (#1939)).
readingExamples: 挙がる (あ.がる), 挙げる (あ.げる)
words: to raise, to fly, to give (an example)
at a stroke, with a single swoop
